name: Charlie the Duck
description: Charlie the Duck is a classic side-scrolling platform game. Run through levels, collect coins, diamonds and other power ups. Jump on top of enemies to defeat them. Dive into the water to find hidden areas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 or later compatible card Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM
